title: On the Permanence of Vertices in Network Communities

author: Tanmoy Chakraborty, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur

So in this presentation will be talking about on the permanence of vertices in network communities.
This is a joint work between IIT Kerper and University of Nebraska at Omaha.
So here I'm going to present my perspective about communities.
Let's take an example here.

So the more the clustering coefficient, the less the penalty.
